pageContent: Background: Although the retrograde approach to nerve sparing (NS) aimed at maximizing NS during robot-assisted radical prostatectomy (RARP) has been described, its significant benefits compared to the antegrade approach have not yet been investigated.

metaData.source:
Urogenital function 3 years after abdominoperineal excision for rectal cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29679517/
